title: COVID-19: The Fastest Economic Crash in History
description: A short lesson to help you apply COVID-19: The Fastest Economic Crash in History.

hook.text: In March 2020, the global economy shut down in two weeks. US GDP fell 31.4% in Q2 â€” the steepest drop ever recorded.

buildup.text: Lockdowns halted supply and demand simultaneously. Restaurants, airlines, hotels, and retail collapsed overnight.

discovery.text: Governments responded with unprecedented stimulus: the US alone injected $5 trillion.

twist.text: Markets recovered in months while the real economy suffered for years.

climax.text: COVID proved governments can prevent depression through massive spending â€” but the bill comes later as inflation.

punchline.text: The cure for the fastest crash was the fastest money printing in history.

quiz.question: What was the 'K-shaped recovery' during COVID?
options: Some groups (tech workers) recovered quickly while others (service workers) continued struggling
